===Stone Tablet===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Stone Tablet:''' "The golden sandstorm and burning sun will exorcise the darkness on your behalf, guiding you who perished here and returning your spirit to [[the Orchard of Pairidaeza]]."

==Trivia==
* {{Lang|''{{w|Sobek}}''|egy=sbk}} is one of the ancient Egyptian gods.
** In Sumeru lore, Sobek is the name of the Crocodile King, one of King Deshret's Seven Pillars.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Asenath}}</ref>
